com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class BorderLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.BorderLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    WComponents 1.1.4. Use WRow and WColumn or ColumnLayout instead. It is preferred that an application use WTemplate for layout as this provides for lighter payloads and more responsive UIs.

    @Deprecated
public class BorderLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    BorderLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates BorderLayout.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Mark Reeves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BorderLayout.BorderLayoutConstraint
      Deprecated. 
      An enumeration of the possible locations for content within a border layout.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorderLayout

        public BorderLayout()
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a border layout.

      • BorderLayout

        @Deprecated
public BorderLayout(int hgap,
                       int vgap)
        Deprecated. use BorderLayout(Size, Size) instead.
        Creates a border layout with the gap between component areas.
        Parameters:
        hgap - the horizontal space between the west, center and east cells
        vgap - the vertical space between the north cell, middle row and south cell

      • BorderLayout

        public BorderLayout(Size hSpace,
            Size vSpace)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a border layout with the gap between component areas.
        Parameters:
        hSpace - the horizontal space between the west, center and east cells
        vSpace - the vertical space between the north cell, middle row and south cell
